attributes.action: Increase the level of financial support to small businesses during lockdown 2
attributes.additional_details: Small businesses are the bedrock of our economy. They pay full taxes and employ millions and have been closed again! They need support to survive being forced to close again at, for what is many, the busiest time of year in the pre Christmas rush.  They have paid for stock and have rent, utilities, loan repayments etc to make! They have been offered not much more than 1 third of the support compared to last lockdown and many will not survive! They need government help now!
attributes.background: Small businesses, even though they have taken expensive measures to be covid secure, have been closed again.   Last lockdown they were given £10000 to support them for 3 months and this time it is £1334 for 1 month! This is not adequate! It is the pre Christmas rush.  They need more to survive

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329210

If there is particular support your want to be provided to SMEs during the Covid-19 outbreak you could start a new petition stating in more detail what support should be provided.
